'''Zutto K'Lotha''' was a [[Chultan (ethnicity)|Chultan]] [[alchemist]] for hire from the city of [[Neverwinter]], active in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Zutto was already an experienced virtuoso alchemist by the time she traveled from her home in [[Southwest Faer√ªn]] to the northern city of Neverwinter to secure some trade agreements. She quickly found herself beguiled by the Neveren alchemy and decided to stay. Since then, Zutto had been making a living by offered her alchemical services for hire.
